trait.name: Resistant
entries: Advantage on Strength, Dexterity and Constitution saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Trench Raider makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Raider Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Smoke
entries: Throws a smoke granade, range 50F, Radius 15F, heavy obscurred area, all enemy creatures inside make a Const. saving throw or take 4D8 fire dmg or half as much on a successful save

action.name: Missile
entries: Turns 3 Stones into magic missiles over 2 Turns, 3 missiles that all hit automaticaly for 2D4 + 2 force dmg on hit

bonus.name: Dodge
entries: The Trench Raider makes the Dodge action. Disadvantage on all attack rolls against this creature

bonus.name: Disengage
entries: The Trench Raider makes the Disengage action. Doesn't provoke oportunity attacks

bonus.name: Additional Attack
entries: The Trench Raider makes another Attack with his Club action.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Trench Raider gets +5 AC, if its a melee attack and it fails, the Trench Raider makes a counter attack with his Club.

trait.name: Horse
entries: HP 60, AC 16

trait.name: Mounted Combat
entries: Has Advantage on attack Rolls on against enemy's on the ground.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Trench Raider makes two Saber attacks.

action.name: Saber
entries: Melee, +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@damage 2d6 + 5} slashing damage.

action.name: Lance Charge
entries: Melee, +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@damage 2d10 + 10} piercing damage. Make DC18 Dex save or fall prone

action.name: Martini Henry
entries: Ranged, +7 to hit, reach 50/150 ft., one target. {@damage 3d10 + 10} piercing damage. Crits if shot at exactly 30 feet range

action.name: Gas Granade
entries: Throws a gas granade, 30F Range, 20F Radius, Dis. on all attacks if inside, if longer than 3 Turns inside -> poisoned, Const save or 2D10 + 10 Poison dmg or halfed when success

action.name: Bandages
entries: Heals himself or the Horse for 4D10 + 15 HP -> takes 2 Turns

reaction.name: Dodge
entries: Targeting attack gets disadvantage

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Trench Raider makes two Ranged attacks.

action.name: Tank Rifle
entries: Ranged, +7 to hit, reach 500/1000 ft., one target. {@damage 3d10 + 7} piercing damage. if the AC is over 20 the sniper has +14 to Atk. and an addtional +20 dmg

action.name: Dagger
entries: Melee, +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@damage 2d8 + 4} slashing damage. 10F knockback on hit

action.name: Snipe
entries: Only make 1 attack with the Tank rifle but ignore 3/4 Cover and dmg dies cant be lower than 5

action.name: Explsive Mine
entries: 30F Range, 10F Radius, sets 3 mines on the ground, when near -> Dex save or 6D8 + 10 Thunder dmg, halfed if successfull

bonus.name: Hide
entries: (3/3) Goes invisible for 1 Turn -> DC20 Perception check

reaction.name: Barrel Roll
entries: Jump 15 Feet without triggering Opportunity attacks

reaction.name: Shield Spell
entries: (2/2) +5 Ac -> Immune to magic missile and rifle shots
